home.title: Our Apps
home.desc: Privacy policies, support pages, and marketing pages for our apps.
home.keylaunch_desc: A fast, minimal keyboard launcher for macOS.
home.baking_note_desc: A recipe management app for baking enthusiasts.

support.title: KeyLaunch Support
support.desc: KeyLaunch is a macOS keyboard app launcher. If you need help, send us an email and include your macOS version for faster troubleshooting.
support.contact_desc: Need help or want to report a bug?
support.quick_check_desc: If shortcut is not working, check hotkey conflicts and confirm hotkeys are not paused.
support.faq_q1: How do I set a shortcut?
support.faq_a1: Open KeyLaunch, click a key, choose an app, then save.
support.faq_a2: Check hotkey conflicts and make sure hotkeys are not paused.

marketing.title: Launch apps in one keystroke.
marketing.lead: KeyLaunch is a fast, minimal keyboard launcher for macOS. Assign keys to your favorite apps and jump into your workflow instantly.
marketing.download_btn: Download on the Mac App Store
marketing.feature1_desc: Open your most-used apps from the keyboard without hunting through Dock or Spotlight results.
marketing.feature2_desc: Pick a key, choose an app, save. Your shortcuts are easy to configure and adjust anytime.
marketing.feature3_desc: Designed specifically for Mac workflows, with a clean interface and low cognitive overhead.
marketing.step1: Open KeyLaunch and select a shortcut key.
marketing.step2: Assign the key to the app you want.
marketing.step3: Press the shortcut and launch instantly.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: KeyLaunch ("the App") does not collect any personal information from users.
privacy.no_collection_desc: No account sign-in, analytics SDKs, ads SDKs, or tracking technologies are used.
privacy.local_desc: Shortcut settings stay on your Mac. We do not upload your data to external servers.
privacy.no_sharing_desc: We do not sell, share, or disclose user data to third parties.
